title: The Art of <1>Hospitality</1>
subtitle: A comfortable holiday is waiting for you.
promotionalPost: Maxx Royal Resorts was founded in 2011 with the belief that luxury travel should not be limited. With an approach rooted in Turkish hospitality, we are dedicated to providing impeccable hospitality to our guests. We wholeheartedly believe that the hospitality experience should be authentic, just like the guests we serve, who inspire us.
promotionalPost2: What you will experience here is more than a holiday, it is an indescribable experience that arouses different and sincere emotions in everyone.
personalServiceParagraph: We offer personalised services with the awareness that every guest is very valuable.
personalServiceParagraph2: While you focus on the special moments of your holiday, we take care of all your needs with Maxx Assistant service. All your requests and requests regarding your holiday are resolved by your personal holiday assistant.
theBestParagraph: Maxx Royal is part of The Leading Hotels of the World, an organisation of high-standard luxury hotels.
theBestParagraph2: With 90 years of commitment to delivering the perfect hospitality experience, being recognised in The Leading Hotels of the World is a testament to the future of Maxx Royal services.
unlimitedExperienceParagraph: The unique experiences we create distinguish us as one of the pioneers of the hospitality industry. With our world-class restaurants, wellness programme, award-winning kids club and personalised services, we offer unique and impressive destinations where every guest will meet their expectations and find a piece of themselves and their dreams.
unlimitedExperienceParagraph2: Our aim is to create extraordinary experiences that leave lasting traces beyond a holiday, where you will gain new awareness.
